title: quarkus-jdbc-db2 does not work with latest DB2 image

labels.name: triage/out-of-date
labels.description: This issue/PR is no longer valid or relevant

body:
### Describe the bug

Using the image: `ibmcom/db2:11.5.6.0` (the latest one), it does not work with the extension `quarkus-jdbc-db2`. 
Runtime error:
```
12:13:19.761 INFO  [app] __  ____  __  _____   ___  __ ____  ______ 
12:13:19.762 INFO  [app]  --/ __ \/ / / / _ | / _ \/ //_/ / / / __/ 
12:13:19.762 INFO  [app]  -/ /_/ / /_/ / __ |/ , _/ ,< / /_/ /\ \   
12:13:19.762 INFO  [app] --\___\_\____/_/ |_/_/|_/_/|_|\____/___/   
12:13:19.762 INFO  [app] 12:13:18,186 Datasource '<default>': [jcc][t4][2030][11211][4.29.24] Se ha producido un error de comunicaciones durante las operaciones en el socket subyacente de la conexi贸n, corriente de entrada de socket, 
12:13:19.763 INFO  [app] o corriente de salida de socket.  Ubicaci贸n del error: Reply.fill() - insufficient data (-1).  Mensaje: Los datos no son suficientes.. ERRORCODE=-4499, SQLSTATE=08001
12:13:19.763 INFO  [app] 12:13:18,188 HHH000342: Could not obtain connection to query metadata: com.ibm.db2.jcc.am.DisconnectNonTransientConnectionException: [jcc][t4][2030][11211][4.29.24] Se ha producido un error de comunicaciones durante las operaciones en el socket subyacente de la conexi贸n, corriente de entrada de socket, 
12:13:19.763 INFO  [app] o corriente de salida de socket.  Ubicaci贸n del error: Reply.fill() - insufficient data (-1).  Mensaje: Los datos no son suficientes.. ERRORCODE=-4499, SQLSTATE=08001
12:13:19.763 INFO  [app]        at com.ibm.db2.jcc.am.b7.a(b7.java:338)
12:13:19.763 INFO  [app]        at com.ibm.db2.jcc.t4.a.a(a.java:573)

12:13:19.766 INFO  [app]        at com.ibm.db2.jcc.t4.b.a(b.java:860)

```

The DB2 container is up and running.

Only works using either `ibmcom/db2:11.5.5.1` or `ibmcom/db2:11.5.5.0`

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

Either follow the guide from https://quarkus.io/guides/datasource
Or using our test suite: https://github.com/quarkus-qe/quarkus-test-suite/blob/main/sql-db/vertx-sql/src/test/java/io/quarkus/qe/vertx/sql/handlers/Db2HandlerIT.java

(it uses also the jdbc reactive client, but without it, it also fails).
